raw_comment: What am I missing? Nowhere does it say that the dots represent both age groups for each country and frankly, a much more interesting graphic would be one that shows how each age group responded to the question. There’s no way to know the way this is plotted. Perhaps you forgot to add the second graphic to the email? I’m trying to be as generous as possible here because mistakes happen!
ace_sentences: I do not know what I am missing.
The text does not say that the dots represent both age groups for each country.
A more interesting graphic would show how each age group responded to the question.
There is no way to know how the data is plotted.
Perhaps you forgot to add a second graphic to the email.
I try to be as generous as possible.
